name: Eastern Air Temple
description: One of the two temples\nexclusively housing female\nairbenders.

name: Western Air Temple
description: One of the two temples\nexclusively housing female\nairbenders.

name: Southern Air Temple
description:
One of the two temples
exclusively housing male
airbenders. Childhood home of
Avatar Aang.

name: Northern Air Temple
description: One of the two temples\nexclusively housing male\nairbenders.

name: Foggy Swamp
description: Place for immigrants of the Southern Water Tribe with an extensive array of fauna and flora.

name: Spirit Oasis
description: A verdant and lush garden located in a cave in the Northern Water Tribe's capital city at the North Pole.

name: Northern Water Tribe
description: The largest division of its nation and is located on an island situated near the North Pole.

name: Southern Water Tribe
description: Minor division of the Water Tribe. Its people are scattered in tiny villages and settlements located on an island by the South Pole.

name: Si Wong Desert
description: The largest desert in the world.

name: Ba Sing Se
description: The monolithic capital of the Earth Kingdom.

name: Kyoshi Island
description: Famous as the birthplace of Avatar Kyoshi and as the home of the elite Kyoshi Warriors.

name: Omashu
description: The second largest city in the Earth Kingdom and the capital of one of its provinces ruled by King Bumi.

name: Fire Nation Capital
description: The seat of the government\nfor the Fire Nation

name: Sun Warriors' Ancient City
description: Large, historic settlement\nlocated on an island north\nof the Fire Nation mainland.

name: Fire Fountain City
description: A large industrial city\nlocated in the Fire Nation.

name: Lion Turtle
description: Honorably referred to as Ancient One by the spirits, it is the largest known animal in the world.

name: Spirit Wilds
description: Home to spirits in the mortal realm
